channel.title: SeaX Release Notes on
channel.description: Recent content in SeaX Release Notes on

item.title: SeaX Release History
item.description: 5/6/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Updated the call logs list. Fixed an issue where empty chats were generated when creating new contacts. Resolved a memory leak issue. Fixed Twilio sub-account verification errors. 4/24/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Optimized performance for bulk message sending. Synchronized phone_capability with SeaContact. 4/10/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Fixed issue where WhatsApp message templates could not be retrieved.
